synopsis.text: Wang Ke is a financial genius who is accidentally transported to the Shenzhou Star world by an ancestral magic sword. Armed with knowledge and business acumen from modern-day Earth, Wang Ke navigates this new world with wit and cunning. Seeking to build a business empire, Wang Ke rescues and escorts an influential princess to the Heavenly Wolf Sect, earning him favor and backing. However, this draws him into the escalating conflict between the righteous and demonic sects. Leveraging his silver tongue and unique talents, Wang Ke plays both sides, attaining prominence while concealing his true motivations. As Wang Ke accumulates power and wealth, his actions begin influencing the balance of power in the realm, for better or worse. Though driven by self-interest and money above all else, this crafty outsider finds himself stepping into the role of defender and eliminator of demons. In time, his wheeling and dealing ways carry him to become the Immortal King.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
